rewards.description: 2XKO is a free 2v2 fighting game featuring the iconic champions from League of Legends. To celebrate the launch of the game on October 7, we're kicking off a special Twitch Drop campaign featuring two exclusive in-game rewards: the exclusive "LIVE NOW" Player Card and Player Title. Fans can earn both by watching participating streamers from the 2XKO creator community as they queue up and join the fight. Just link your game account to Twitch, tune in during the campaign, and claim your rewards to get in on the action.
rewards.name: 2XKO Season 0 Launch

rewards.description:
Brand New [Homestead System] is available now! 
Coconut Spring Isle belongs to you and you only! Rally your pets and start turning Coconut Spring Isle into your dream home from scratch! Build anything you want, however you want! As your homestead level gradually increases, various buildings, scenic objects, vegetation, furniture, and decorations will become available for production! Use them to decorate your new home! 
Pet companions are essential powerful allies in building Coconut Spring Isle. All of your pet companions can join in the construction work of your new homestead! Different pets have different talents, so assign them work according to their strengths for maximum productivity! 
Crystal of Atlan is on Steam now! Add to wishlist and try demo on Steam Next Fest on October 13!
rewards.name: Home System & Steam Demo

rewards.description: üéÆ Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  üïí Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  üí∞ Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  üéà Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  üåü How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
